revision.text: ==English== ===Etymology=== Borrowed from {{bor|en|ja|櫓投げ}}, meaning ''[[inner]] [[thigh]] [[throw]]''. ===Noun=== {{en-noun|yaguranage}} # {{lb|en|sumo}} A [[kimarite]] in which the [[attacker]] pulls his opponent towards him, places his knee against his opponent's inner thigh and drives the leg upwards while forcing him over.
